member.name: T:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEcall
member.summary: Method call command for BOOSE language Supports: call myMethod 10 5 call myMethod(10,5)

member.name: T:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEcanvas
member.summary: Canvas class that draws shapes and text for the BOOSE program

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEcanvas.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new canvas with the given width and height.

member.name: P:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEcanvas.Xpos
member.summary: Current X position of the pen.

member.name: P:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEcanvas.Ypos
member.summary: Current Y position of the pen.

member.name: P:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEcanvas.PenColour
member.summary: Current colour of the pen.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEcanvas.Set(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Changes the size of the canvas.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEcanvas.SetColour(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the pen colour using red, green and blue values.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEcanvas.MoveTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves the pen to a new position without drawing.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEcanvas.DrawTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws a line from the current pen position to a new position.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEcanvas.Clear
member.summary: Clears the canvas to grey.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEcanvas.Reset
member.summary: Resets the pen position and colour to their starting values.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEcanvas.Circle(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws a circle with the current pen position as the centre.
member.param: True to fill the circle, false to only draw the outline.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEcanvas.Rect(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws a rectangle at the current pen position.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEcanvas.Tri(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws a simple triangle based on the current pen position.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEcanvas.WriteText(System.String)
member.summary: Draws a piece of text at the current pen position.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEcanvas.getBitmap
member.summary: Returns the bitmap so it can be shown on the form.

member.summary: Custom circle command that draws using our canvas without enforcing the original BOOSE radius limits.

member.summary: Default constructor used by the factory system.

member.summary: Manual-use constructor (not normally required).

member.summary: Performs the circle drawing action.

member.name: T:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEevaluation
member.summary: Custom evaluation class for handling standalone variable assignments. Allows assignments like "width = 2*radius" after variable declaration.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEevaluation.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor for creating evaluation objects.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEevaluation.CheckParameters(System.String[])
member.summary: Check parameters - override to remove validation.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEevaluation.Compile
member.summary: Compiles the variable assignment statement. Validates that the variable exists before assignment.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEevaluation.Execute
member.summary: Executes the variable assignment. Evaluates the expression and updates the variable value.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEevaluation.EvaluateManually(System.String)
member.summary: Manually evaluates expressions containing variables and arithmetic operations. Replaces variable names with their values and computes the result.

member.name: T:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEfor
member.summary: Unrestricted FOR loop for BOOSE. Supports: for var = start to end step stepValue and also supports: for (init; condition; increment)

member.name: T:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEif
member.summary: If-else statement implementation for BOOSE language

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEif.CheckParameters(System.String[])
member.summary: Check parameters - override to remove validation

member.name: T:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEint
member.summary: Represents an integer variable in the BOOSE language. This class handles declaring, storing and updating whole-number values.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEint.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new integer variable command.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEint.Compile
member.summary: Reads and processes the variable declaration. This extracts the variable name and any starting value.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEint.Execute
member.summary: Evaluates the expression and stores the result as an integer. Updates the program’s variable table with the new value.

member.name: T:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEmethod
member.summary: Method definition for BOOSE language. Supports syntax: method int mulMethod int one, int two ... end method

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEmethod.Tokenise(System.String)
member.summary: Tokenises the method header, removing commas. Example: "int mulMethod int one, int two" -> ["int","mulMethod","int","one","int","two"]

member.name: T:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEmoveto
member.summary: Custom MoveTo command

member.name: T:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEparser
member.summary: Custom parser that handles BOOSE language constructs

member.name: T:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEpeek
member.summary: Peek command - retrieves a value from an array Supports both: peek var = arrayName[index] peek var = arrayName index

member.name: T:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEpen
member.summary: Pen command to change pen color

member.name: T:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEpoke
member.summary: Poke command - sets a value in an array Supports both "poke arrayName[index] = value" and "poke arrayName index = value"

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEpoke.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEpoke.Compile
member.summary: Compiles the poke command

member.summary: Executes the poke command

member.summary: Evaluates an expression as an integer

member.summary: Evaluates an expression

member.name: T:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEreal
member.summary: Custom real (floating-point) variable class that replaces BOOSE's Real class. Removes restrictions on variable names and variable count limits.

member.name: P:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEreal.Value
member.summary: Get or set the double value for this real number.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEreal.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor for creating real variable objects.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEreal.CheckParameters(System.String[])
member.summary: Check parameters - override to remove validation restrictions.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEreal.Compile
member.summary: Compiles the real variable declaration or initialization. Parses variable name and optional initial value expression.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEreal.Execute
member.summary: Executes the real variable initialization. Evaluates the expression and stores the floating-point value.

member.name: T:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSErect
member.summary: Custom rectangle command that draws a rectangle

member.name: T:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEwhile
member.summary: While loop implementation for BOOSE language

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEwhile.CheckParameters(System.String[])
member.summary: Check parameters - override to remove validation

member.name: T:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEwrite
member.summary: Custom write command that supports: - numbers (including real variables) - arithmetic expressions - string literals in quotes - string concatenation with + Example: write "£"+y

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEwrite.EvaluateWriteExpression(System.String)
member.summary: Evaluates a BOOSE write expression. Supports string literals and + concatenation. Falls back to numeric evaluation for pure maths.
